original_text: Then they came near to the village that the disciples were going to. It seemed that Jesus would continue his journey.
korean_text: 그들이 가는 마을에 가까이 가매 예수는 더 가려 하는 것 같이 하시니

sentences.original_text: Then they came near to the village
that the disciples were going to
It seemed that Jesus would continue his journey
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님이 계속 여행을 이어 가실 것처럼 보였습니다
